author: Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
description: Donald Trump has never been a terribly popular president. But, a series of recent polls show him in truly dangerous territory -- flirting with dipping under 40% approval just 115 days into his presidency.
title: Donald Trump's poll numbers should terrify Republicans

author: Andrew Buncombe
description: Donald Trump reportedly revealed highly classified information about Isis to the Russian foreign minister and ambassador in a White House meeting last week.
title: Donald Trump 'revealed highly classified information' to Russian officials

description: Donald Trump revealed highly classified information to the Russian foreign minister and ambassador during a meeting at the White House last week, it was reported on Monday night.
title: Donald Trump 'revealed highly classified intelligence' to Sergey Lavrov, the Russian foreign minister

author: Emily Shugerman
description: Donald Trump's administration is in "a downward spiral" after allegedly leaking classified information to Russian officials, a Republican senator has claimed, joining a chorus of condemnation in Washington.
title: Donald Trump is in a 'downward spiral' following Russia leak report, says Republican senator

author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
description:
On Monday, White House press secretary Sean Spicer refused to offer any clarity on a simple but absolutely critical question: Is President Donald Trump taping phone calls he makes and receives?
The President has nothing further on that," Spicer said at one point.
title: The White House still won't say whether Donald Trump is taping phone calls

author: Saba Hamedy, CNN
description: Was it legal for President Donald Trump to disclose classifed information to Russian officials?
title: If the president says it, is it no longer classified?

description: Donald Trump disclosed highly classified information to the Russian Foreign Minister during their meeting last week, The Washington Post reports.
title: White House denies Trump endangered sources in talks with top Russians

author: Sonam Sheth
description: The news stories President Donald Trump reads can have an enormous effect on critical decisions.
title: Trump's agenda is driven by the news — and that includes 'internet hoaxes'

author: Eli Stokols
description: President Donald Trump's press secretary, Sean Spicer, again declined to say whether or not conversations in the Oval Office are being recorded.
title: Spicer Again Says Trump Has Nothing to Add on ‘Tapes’

description: The Latest on the report that President Donald Trump shared classified information with Russian officials (all times EDT):
title: The Latest: Trump and Jordan's King Abdullah set phone call
